Description.UploadCsv: Add, delete, or update in-experience strings and translations by uploading a CSV file.
Description.DownloadCsv: Review and edit in-experience strings and translation progress by downloading the cloud localization table into a CSV file.
Description.DeleteTable: Delete all in-experience strings and translations in your cloud localization table. Note: This action is irreversible.
Description.LearnMore: Learn more about CSV localization table management
Description.DeleteWarning: Clearing the cloud localization table will delete all in-experience strings and translations permanently.
Description.DeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to proceed?
Description.UploadFailure: The localization table could not be uploaded because of the following error(s):
Description.MakeChanges: Please make changes before uploading the file again or refresh the page to upload a new CSV file.
Description.UploadChanges: The uploaded file includes the following changes:
Description.ConfirmUpload: Are you sure you want to proceed?
Description.TooManyFiles: Please only upload one file at a time.
Description.FileRejectedError: Please only upload one CSV file of max size 3MB.
Description.EmptyCsv: - The uploaded CSV file is empty. If you would like to clear your localization table, please use the 'Delete Table' button to do so
Label.LocalizationTableTooLarge: - Adding new entries from your CSV file would cause your localization table to be over the maximum size of {maxTableSize} entries. Please review your table and remove any old entries.
Description.TooManyRows: - There are {userCsvRowCount} rows in your CSV file. The maximum number of rows allowed is {maxCsvRowCount}.
Description.FailedToLoadCurrentTable: - An error occurred while loading the current localization table. Please try again in a few minutes.
Description.AddLanguagesFailure: - An error occurred while adding new supported language(s). Please try again in a few minutes.
Description.FailureToUploadTable: - An error occurred while updating the table. Please try uploading the CSV file again in a few minutes.
Description.UpdateFailure: Some entries failed to update because of the following error(s):
Description.DownloadFailed: An error occurred while downloading the localization table:
Description.DeleteFailed: Some entries were not deleted because of the following error(s):
Description.RefreshPage: Please refresh your page to see updates to your experience's localization table.
Description.RefreshToRetry: Please refresh the page to upload a new CSV file.
Description.LearnMoreHere: Learn more about CSV localization table management {csvManagementLinkStart}here{csvManagementLinkEnd}.
Description.TryAgainLater: Please refresh your page and try again later.
